name: state/content/close
description: Close a content item (remove from user's open tabs). Handles currentItemId reassignment if closing the active tab.

params.name: userId
params.description: User ID whose content state to modify

params.name: contentItemId
params.description: ID of the content item to close

results.name: openItemsCount
results.description: Number of open items after closing

results.name: currentItemId
results.description: New current item ID after closing (may change if closed item was active)

examples.description: Close a specific tab by content item ID
